subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Wright has had a vexing postseason thus far. In the Mets’ first six games, Wright, a career .298 hitter, was 1 for 19 with eight strikeouts.
snippet: Wright has had a vexing postseason thus far. In the Mets’ first six games, Wright, a career .298 hitter, was 1 for 19 with eight strikeouts.
